h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Rat Sage Staff Location
content: The Rat Sage Staff can be found in Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind Ridge upon defeating Yellow Wind Sage at the end of the chapter. This is a mandatory boss that is at the end of the chapter, so you can't miss him.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Rat_Sage_Staff.md', within the main section titled 'Rat Sage Staff', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Rat Sage Staff Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Rat Sage Staff can be found in Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind Ridge upon defeating Yellow Wind Sage at the end of the chapter. This is a mandatory boss that is at the end of the chapter, so you can't miss him.
